attributes.action: change the newly released Olympic logo.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Following almost universal condemnation, we request the Prime Minister to change the current logo to one that does not insult British people. 

The current logo;
Is a waste of £400,000, 
Reflects negatively on people of London and the country as a whole.
The graphic designers obviously did not consider how the logo would look on a pin badge (pink splodge). 
There is an obvious lack of Olympic rings, or symbols of the city of London.
The poor quality logo will negatively impact proposed sales of souvenirs and ultimately decrease the Olympics benefit to the country.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
